document_data.name: Aumrauth
document_data.comrefs: {{Cite dragon/267/The New Adventures of Volo: Onward!|80}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Aumrauth''' was a realm of [[aquatic elf|aquatic elves]] located in the [[Shining Sea]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1370}}.
document_data.Geography: The Aumrauthen territory was between the island of [[Tharsult]] and the [[Scelptarmouth]] where it poured into the Shining Sea on its eastern shore.
document_data.Government:
Aumrauth was a dyarchy jointly ruled by an Exalted Lord and a Lady Queen who were not required to be married to each other. Lords and Ladies generally served until death, so overly ambitious contenders sometimes resorted to assassination.{{Cite dragon/267/The New Adventures of Volo: Onward!|81}} The heraldry of the realm was a long, dark green pennant emblazoned with a large, white, conically spiraled shell.
[[File:Dragon267-Ron Spencer-Aumrauth-banner.png|thumb|right|275px|''An Aumrauthen warrior brandishing the emblem of the realm.'']]
document_data.Trade: The main trade with the surface world was with fisherfolk that they trusted, exchanging fish, seaweed, and anything else they could harvest that interested the land dwellers for items that caught their fancy. The fisherfolk usually treated the Aumrauthen well because they could get "deep-caught" fish delivered in "seawater sleeves" ([[whale]] rib-cages woven with seaweed) with little risk and for almost no effort.
document_data.History: Little was known of this strong and usually quiet realm. As of 1370 DR, the nation of Aumrauth was at peace, but they had a history of clashing with ships flying the colors of [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
Noble families were part of the power structure of this nation. Some of the most prominent included:
*The [[Alluth]] ({{Pronounce|al|OOth}})
*The [[Ceretlan]] ({{Pronounce|SEER|tlann}}
*The [[Duthjuth]]
*The [[Gourael]]
*The [[Ildroun]]
*The [[Jaglene]]
*The [[Laralytha]] ({{Pronounce|LAR|al|ITH|a}})
*The [[Meirityn]]
*The [[Nolbrae]]
*The [[Torthtan]]
*The [[Yundraer]]
